body.name: Miyoo Mini Plus Handheld Game Console 3.5 inch Classic System Retro Video Games Consoles Portable Rechargeable Hand Held 64G with Case (Black)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 15 hrs 30 mins
features: The Bright Screen and Battery: Miyoo Mini Plus has 3.5-in display and 640x480 resolution, you can see more details. 3000 mAh high-density battery with long standby time and more secure.
Classic Operating System: The Game Consoles Equipped with a superior system, effectively improving the running speed and higher stability.
Supports 12000+ Classic Games: The Miyoo Mini Plus Works for dozens of handheld emulator: covering many types of games, adventure, shooting, action, racing, and arcade etc.
Enjoy Funny Games Anywhere: The game console has a compact and lightweight body design and an ultra-appropriate size, which is very convenient to take with you wherever you are.
Package Contains: 1 x Miyoo Mini Plus Game Console(Black Transparent), 1 x Screen Protector, 1 x 64G TF Card, 1 x Carry bag, 1 x User Manual, 1x USB-C Charging Cable, 1 x Card Reader

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 393 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was pretty hesitant ordering this at first since I’ve been seeing videos of people trying to sell it on tiktok and such. Though I took a risk and the item came in 2 days based off my prime shipping it also comes with a charger I just did not add it in picture. The games have all worked as far as I’ve tried. I have had the device for about 2 weeks now and it’s pretty fun playing all the different types of games. The only thing I will complain about is the fact that the first few days of playing it the battery life was very short and only lasted about like an hour or 2 but then after less than a week I’ve been playing on it here and there and the battery has not drained at all. So now I believe it does last at least a good bit of hours. Good product if you miss playing retro games and fun to play with if you’re just bored in general.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, good little unit
reviews.reviewText: The handheld works well with no upgrades necessary. Battery life is good for hours of escape from reality. I would recommend it to a friend. For kids or adult kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome little machine!
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to order on Amazon due to a few concerning reviews but took the chance anyway and it's everything it says it is. SOO many games. Alot I'm not familiar with but already have probably 40-50 hours of playtime in. I will say the '10,000 games' mark might be true if you speak numerous languages lol. But still a crapload of USA and english translated games. FYI if you're looking for specific games you don't get with the unit, don't worry. There's a ton of support online and sites to visit to download almost anything you can think of if you want. 100% recommend buying if you're a 90s kid or older, looking to rekindle childhood memories and have infinite hours of fun. I'm not a YouTuber or paid to say this, just a guy who grew up with gameboys and nintendo,sega,Playstation,etc.Also (sorry) some reviews say you can't save your game (pokemon, RPGs, etc.) You can through the RetroArch menu. Just have to play around a bit and learn how it works. But again, tons of support online if you have questions or need tutorials!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Petite, wellbuilt but not well thought out handheld
reviews.reviewText: It delivers on what it claims, many many retro games in an affordable handheld device.Decent battery life & screen. Buttons responsive & hardware is good quality. No surprises at this price point.However, no bluetooth. Really? In this point of technology, BT not included seems odd.Also, organization of game titles, not great. Some games have several different versions, often just different languages, they count them as distinct titles. So 10,000 games is more like 3,000 in your supported language. They could put in a language filter, wouldnt be too hard.Titles can be very long, they fall off edge of screen and cannot be read. Word Wrap, Miyoo. Word. Wrap!Form factor: Way too small. Could have crammed in more battery or screen for a more reasonable, adult hands sized frame. But they opted for tiny box hand held. They did not think it through.For those minor deficiencies, 4 / 5 stars on this one.If GB was your thing back in the day, Welcome home, this will do nicely to cure your retro fix.Update: battery life is not great at most,1.5 hrs, you’d be lucky to see more than that. Will do more testing as I play it but so far not living up to the hype

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic little machine
reviews.reviewText: A fantastic little machine it reminds me of a old school game boy except it has a ton of games from different systems throughout the years like the sega master system, sega genesis, atari 2600, atari 7800 etc it's well worth the money you pay for it and it's a ton of fun to play if you're a gamer or if you have one in your life this is the system to get for him/her/them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this system.
reviews.reviewText: I’m sure the vast majority of you who are viewing this product are well aware of the Miyoo Mini+ already. And I’ll say, this system was exactly what I wanted and it came next day. It’s worth the extra few bucks rather than waiting weeks for an over seas shipment.For those of you who are not familiar with the miyoo mini+, this compact, beautiful emulator can play the majority of all of your nostalgia games. This device comes preloaded with 5000+ games, which makes it easy to play straight out of the box. Or you can get fancy and update the software to Onion Os and download even more game depending on the size of your sd card.This device is quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The device didn’t work out of the box.
reviews.reviewText: If you’re looking to buy a ready-to-play console, this is not it. None of the games work, tried to update the firmware, had a new OS, nothing worked. The SD card is cheap and filled with corrupted paths within. If I knew better, I should’nt have purchased the 128GB version and just got the cheapest one. I feel that I was scammed, as none of the games work. On the bright side, the console itself is customizable and very intuitive. It will take you sometime to get it the way you like, but do not buy the 128GB version, It a waste of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great emulator with stock OS. Even better with onion OS.
Es una consola retro que está bien lograda te da horas de diversión miles de juegos clásicos

reviews.reviewTitle: Es una excelente consola, corre los juegos sin problemas y trae un gran catálogo de juegos 👌🏼

reviews.reviewText: Estaba muy emocionado por jugar esta consola, pero llego defectuoso, solo puedo jugar por 5 min y se apaga por si sola.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente... solo no se lo den a un niño
reviews.reviewText: El software es increible, ya viene con más de 1000 juegos desde sega, gb, gba, arcade, ps, etc...Solo que nunca se lo presten a un niño.. ya que es muy fragil la pantalla, y si lo tiran, se daña muy fácil... hay piezas para reemplazar en Alibaba.... pero ahorranse toda la lata de soldar...
